title: Life Wizard’s Uprisal ~ The Oppressed Life Wizard Does as He Pleases ~ - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Death of Loved Ones   Discrimination   Dungeons   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Magic   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Tsukihigen   月汰元
description: The present age where magic and dungeons exist. I was born with a talent for life magic. It is also the highest rank S. However, life magic is said to be useless. One day I got a Sage system in a dungeon. Only a Sage can create new magic, I got it. From that day on, my journey started.>
